translation: Taking up their bows, arrows and quivers, the charming warriors are fighting.249.
With the winking of their eyelids, the warriors are getting angry and giving jolts to one another while laughing.250.
The charming warriors are discharging their arrows patiently.251.
The warriors are fighting in retaliation and are grappling one another.252.
The warriors are challenging without getting tired; and they are penetrating forward.253.
The unchoppable warriors are being killed.254.
The warriors striking blows, are bowing, challenging and getting up again.255.

gurmukhi: ik ju`tYNq bIrM ] ik Cu`tYNq qIrM ] ik Pu`tYNq AMgM ] ik ju`tYNq jMgM ]256]
transliteration: Ki Jouttaint Bderan|| Ki Chhouttaint Tderan|| Ki Phouttaint Anadg|| Ki Jouttaint Janadg||256||
translation: The arrows are being discharged, the warriors are fighting, the limbs are being split and the war is continuing.256.

gurmukhi: ik m`cYq sUrM ] ik Gu`mYq hUrM ] ik b`jYq K`gM ] ik au`TYq A`gM ]257]
transliteration: Ki Machchait Sooran|| Ki Ghoummait Booran|| Ki Bajjait Khadganng|| Ki Outthait Aggadg||257||
translation: The warriors are getting excited, the heavenly damsels are roaming and the sparks of fire coming out of the colliding swords.257.

gurmukhi: ik Pu`tyq AMgM ] ik ru`Jyq jMgM ] ik n`cyq qwjI ] ik g`jyq gwjI ]258]
transliteration: Ki Phouttet Anadg|| Ki Rujjhet Janadg|| Ki Nachchet Taajee|| Ki Gadjet Gadjee||258||
translation: The limbs are being splitted, all are absorbed in the war, the horses are dancing and the warriors are thundering.258.

gurmukhi: ik G`lyq GwXM ] ik J`lyq cwXM ] ik if`gyq Du`mI ] ik J`myq Ju`mI ]259]
transliteration: Ki Ghallet Ghaayan|| Ki Jhallet Chaayan|| Ki Digget Dhoummee|| Ki Jhammet Jhoummee||259||
translation: The blows are being endured with pleasure; the warriors are falling down while swinging and thundering.259.

gurmukhi: ik C`fyq hUhM ] ik su`Byq bXUhM ] ik if`gyq cyqM ] ik n`cyq pRyqM ]260]
transliteration: Ki Chhaddet Hoohan|| Ki Soubbhet Byoohan|| Ki Digget Chetan|| Ki Nachchet Pretan||260||
translation: Contacting the numberless spirits, the warriors are lamenting; they are getting unconscious and falling down; the ghosts are dancing.260.

gurmukhi: ik bu`Tyq bwxM ] ik Ju`Jyq juAwxM ] ik m`qyq nUrM ] ik q`kyq hUrM ]261]
transliteration: Ki Boutthet Baanan|| Ki Jhoukkhet Juaanan|| Ki Mattet Nooran|| Ki Takket Hooran||261||
translation: The warriors are fighting catching hold of arrows; the beauty is resplendent on all the faces and the heavenly damsels are looking at the warriors.261.
